column4: so ... as I understand it ... in /etc/apt/sources.lst, everywhere it says "breezy" ... like in "breezy-backports" ... I change it to "dapper-backports"  ... correct?
there are no dapper backports, yet.  so, comment those lines out.  But yeah, all the breezys become dappers.
ok ... that leaves security, multiverse and universe ... sound right?
When you try and play a media file you don't have the codec for, it prompts you to install the proper codec
There won't be anything in the /opt folder currently.  As for the unavailable, that's odd.
Does it look like all the stuff belongsin the same folders?
that was just using one particular file manager .. gentoo
A linux distribution, just like Ubuntu
no ... there is a gentoo file manager too
I don't see Midnight Commander in Synaptic ... but there is Gnome-Commander ... I guess it's about the same thing
